pkgmetadata.longdescription: A Collection of Efficient and Extremely Fast R Functions // A collection of fast (utility) functions for data analysis. Column- and row- wise means, medians, variances, minimums, maximums, many t, F and G-square tests, many regressions (normal, logistic, Poisson), are some of the many fast functions. Reference: Tsagris M, Papadakis M. (2018). Taking R to its limits: 70+ tips. PeerJ Preprints 6:e26605v1 doi:10.7287/peerj.preprints.26605v1.
